pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, October 25, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

8:40 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with Minister of Veterans Affairs Seamus O’Regan, will attend the welcoming ceremony with military honours for Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte, and will participate in a wreath-laying ceremony.

National War Memorial
Wellington Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.
    • Accreditation from the Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, please contact Pierre Cuguen at pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca.

9:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the welcoming ceremony for Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte.

Rotunda
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Accreditation from the Parliamentary Press Gallery is required. For more information, please contact Pierre Cuguen at pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca.

9:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks to the House of Commons. An address from Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte will follow.

House of Commons
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte.

Room 238-S
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a business luncheon with Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte, and will deliver remarks.

Room 253-D
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Open coverage for opening remarks

2:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with students at Gloucester High School with Prime Minister of the Netherlands Mark Rutte.

Auditorium
Gloucester High School
2060 Ogilvie Road

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive via the main entrance off Ogilvie Road no later than 1:40 p.m.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the 25th anniversary celebration of the Chrétien Government, and will deliver remarks.

Ballroom
Fairmont Château Laurier Hotel
1 Rideau Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks
    • Media should present themselves to the Drawing Room no later than 5:00 p.m.

North York, Ontario

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Premio Italia Nel Mondo 2018 Awards Dinner, and will deliver remarks.

Ballroom, First Floor
Montecassino Hotel
3710 Chesswood Drive

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for remarks
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 7:45 p.m.
